name: places/ChIJ_8MNxZZZwokRhSxWec_Nyvc
formattedAddress: 114 W Houston St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 114 W Houston St, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text:
Bad massage. Uneven pressure. Different work on left side vs. right side. Extra extra oil. Not great.

I was putting it behind me and even asked him to add 17% tip to the credit card charge and he actually tried to scold me. Spent five minutes saying 20% showing me a calculator, and shaking his head before finally charging what I told him to charge.

Will not be back.

originalText.text: I had an awful experience. I expressed where exactly on my body I could not tolerate pressure, and the masseuse made me scream in pain three times. There was zero expertise in the way she performed the massage; it was rushed, imprecise, and I am in pain now, and was fine when I came in. She belched so many times that I was scared she was going to vomit on me. I was more tense afterward than when I came in. Awful. I wish I had just left and not paid. Horrible. Terrifying, actually. Go to Waterlily Spa on Broome & Elizabeth st instead. Those people are professionals. The woman working Friday 1/12/2024 at 8-9pm should be fired. My back is hurting as I write this.

originalText.text: Lovely foot massage, busy place, my guy took care of my feet like they were his wife's.  Felt lovely, would go again if lived here.

text.text: Lovely foot massage, busy place, my guy took care of my feet like they were his wife's.  Felt lovely, would go again if lived here.

originalText.text: Do not be tempted by the cheap prices - this is the WORST massage I've ever had. I feel 10x more sore than I did going in, and despite asking her to be more gentle 8+ times, she did not change her pressure slightly. I don't think she had any idea what she was doing or was even certified masseur, digging her fingers into nooks and crannies that should probably never be massaged. I sincerely hope I'm not injured, and to top it off I still tipped her 20+% and she didn't even say thank you.

originalText.text: Best massage! If you're looking for a good quality massage and don't need the extras like snacks and sauna then this is just perfect. The ambiance was calming and very relaxing. I was in Thailand last summer and this massage was just as good or better than the real Thai massages that I have experienced. I went with both my mother and grandmother and they said it was also the best massage they ever had! Really great find!
